description:
Nightstand simply displays a completely black background while in Exhibition mode. This is for users that want to keep their phone on a touchstone by their bed at night without being bothered by the light from the time display on their phone.

»» Added: Pre3 & TouchPad Compatibility

Make sure to enable Nightstand in the Exhibition preferences app. We’re aware that the backlight remains on while in Exhibition mode and are currently searching for a way to automatically turn it off. If we find a way to do so, it will certainly be added in an update.

Please let us know if there are any features you’d like to see us add. We welcome any & all feedback at nightstand@appsotutely.com

Requires: webOS 2.1.0
Available in: English
